Member Function Documentation

static ImmSWCamera* ImmSWCameraFactory::AcquireSWCamera ( int  port,
long  baud 
) [static]

Acquires a Surgical Workstation Camera

Parameters:
port = (0,1,2,3,4) --> (auto-detect, COM1, COM2, COM3, COM4)
baud = (9600L, 14400L, 38400L, 57600L, 115200L) If port = 0, it will try to auto-detect
Returns:
The method returns NULL pointer if a device is not found, otherwise it returns a pointer to the constructed camera interface.
static void ImmSWCameraFactory::ReleaseSWCamera ( ImmSWCamera *  pSWCamera  )  [static]

Release the ImmSWCamera acquired with AcquireSWCamera.

Parameters:
pSWCamera points to the acquired camera device, whose memory will be freed by the camera. The calling method should be sure to reset the input pointer to NULL.
